website_summaries.verdict: This playhouse will thrill your child with working shutters, door, doorbell and a phone that rings. It's a little shorter than others, so it's probably best for toddlers and preschoolers.
pros: Open design with kitchen table, built-in seat, faucet and burner
Phone and doorbell with real sound
Drain holes in floor for optional outdoor play
Measures 46.5"H x  51"L x 35"W. For age 18 months+
cons: Plastic table and roof may not support children who climb, so use with supervision

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it fills up like a pool inside after a hard rain
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! The doorbell still works even after being outside in the humid weather. I can even fit inside with her. The only issue that I would suggest a fix for is to include some drainahe holes in the bottom. Otherwise it fills up like a pool inside after a hard rain, making us have to tip it completely sideways to dump the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together and solid structure
customer_reviews.text: Can't get our 2 year old grand daughter out of this playhouse. We also bought her the accessories to go with it> food and utensils....easy to put together and solid structure. Easy to watch her with all the openings...highly recommend this for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: papa8

customer_reviews.title: My 19 month old and 5 year old both love it! A bonus is that the cute little ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little house! My 19 month old and 5 year old both love it! A bonus is that the cute little doorbell is not loud at all, so if they ring it over and over it does not drive this mama crazy. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Runner Mama 79

customer_reviews.title: The working doorbell is their favorite thing! We planted some flowers in the flower ...
customer_reviews.text: Our children adore this playhouse. It's larger than I expected and has the cutest details. The working doorbell is their favorite thing! We planted some flowers in the flower box and with daily watering, the have lasted all summer. I wanted a playhouse with a floor so I could set it anywhere and not worry about what was underneath. Easy to sweep and the floor stays cool, even on sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute playhouse. I put together with power drill in 25-30 min. Very easy. She (3) loves it! I was able to sit in it and play with her.
customer_reviews.author: L. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Cool Playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 daughters love this! Looks great in my backyard and provides a ton of entertainment for the kids. The doorbell..mail slot..flower bed...windows..door can withstand harsh weather conditions as well. Totally worth the buy. If your a Prime Member...I reccomend you give it a shot. If you dont like it..simply return for a full hassle free refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse, so durable!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons poor play house took a beating in a storm when a tree fell directly on it! My son was going to disassemble it when he took the roof off, he just stepped on it and it pooped back out, reassembled everything, drilled a couple new holes and it’s perfect again!! The doorbell even works still. I would say that this should get a 10 for durability! The house now sits on what’s left of the tree stump, lol
customer_reviews.author: Anne Janson

customer_reviews.title: Great house
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his little house. Great for indoors or outdoors. Sturdy. However, we have it on our covered screened in porch and there is some mildew on it. Step2 is no help with telling me why that is happening. I know people who have this house and do not have this problem. This is the second Step2 product I have had this mildew issue with.
customer_reviews.author: Pchykeen

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: We've had this playhouse for a month or so now and my toddler LOVES it. His favorite things are ringing the doorbell, going in and out of the door, and opening and closing the shutters on the window. He "talks" on the phone, too. It was easy to assemble, seems very durable, and really does look very cute. If I could change two things about it, I would add a drain of some sort in the bottom to let rain water out (we decided to keep ours indoors instead of outside because of this) and I'd include some plastic letters / mail for kids to put in the little slot on the mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Mangini

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, and the floor prevents scrapes when falling
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, and the floor prevents scrapes when falling. There's plenty to do and the seat in it is a great addition. The only thing I had to do, as mentioned in some other reviews, is drill some additional drain homes to prevent water pooling and mosquito breeding.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice house but......
customer_reviews.text: Received it and it was obviously a return from another customer.Box was in bad shape.The first piece we took out had a little tiny piece broken off.Did not bother with pulling the rest out because it was also scratched or scuffed.Sent it back and went to Toys are Us and bought it for same price.A nice little house and my grandson loves it.Very tight squeeze for an adult to get in and out so do your stretches.
customer_reviews.author: Retirrrrrred

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! My grandson loves it! Bought it for him for his 3rd birthday. Looks exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Walker

customer_reviews.title: It came quickly and the majority of the setup was fairly easy. I feel like the hot day made it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Playhouse for a daycare. It came quickly and the majority of the setup was fairly easy. I feel like the hot day made it a bit more frustrating than it had to be. There was one side piece that did not want to go into the hole correctly and I struggled with it for a good 30 minutes. By the time I finally got it inserted correctly I was worn out. The other side went in without a problem. You will definitely want your drill to put the screws in since there are around 30. It saves you a lot of time and hassle. The children love it and it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Rock747

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 years old and she practically lives in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 years old and she practically lives in this little house. She loves it! Only tip, if you plan to use it over a concrete slab, make few extra holes with a drill at the floor corners so the water drains properly.
customer_reviews.author: SirGio

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Little House
customer_reviews.text: The kiddos love this little house. We've had it for about four months now, and they play in it every time they go outside. I love that it has a floor in the bottom so they don't get as dirty, and they love everything (the mail slot, opening and closing the door and shutters, pushing the doorbell). We have a 6yo, 4yo, and 2yo that play in it and they all fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Jones

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to see if my grandson would play in ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see if my grandson would play in the house or the box it came in. He was not expecting it. He actually did neither, he grabbed my fingers and made me run around the yard. He is 21 months. When he got to it, instead of the door, he tried to climb through the window. Not sure if that means he is going to be a cat burglar or what. He has gotten used to it, he goes in, sits down, picks up the phone, rings the doorbell, and oh yeah, climbs out the window. Did I mention he climbs out the window?
customer_reviews.author: Eugene J.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but be aware of what you actually will need.
customer_reviews.text: I like the house. Very cute. Like all plastic toys they are sturdy. But my main complaint is: NO pre drilled holes for the multiple screws. It was quite a chore to do them and the instructions stated only a hammer and Phillips required for assembly. We used a rubber mallet, hammer, a nail, and a Phillip's. Plus a tiny Phillip's fir the battery box.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri Piacentini

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Cute little playhouse. Fits my 3.5 year old and 1 year old perfectly with room to spare. Even my husband and I can get in there to play with the boys. There are not a lot of bells and whistles, but the kids adore it. It is very easy to assemble. The only downfall (and reason for 4 stars) is, like many reviews have mentioned, it fills up with water every time it rains. Poor design in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Could be a cute little playhouse, but after putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Could be a cute little playhouse, but after putting it together realized the decals were missing, so you can't tell that it's a fireplace or mailbox or anything else. Paid a lot of money to not receive a complete package. I bought it for a Christmas present for my grand kids.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Expect years of fun for grandson and his playmates
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. He's 15 months and loves ringing his door bell and sitting at his own table, playing with the sink and bbq. Easy to maintain, loves playing peekaboo with the shuttered window. Easy to assemble. Nice and airy for summer, like the floor attached feature. Can accommodate up to 3 small children, I'd say good for 12 months to 4 years old depending how tall your child is. Easy to push it to different locations once assembled since floor is attached slides easily across grass or dirt surface.
customer_reviews.author: barry h

customer_reviews.title: it was as discribed
customer_reviews.text: WE had a childs playhouse years ago and it had much more room and it was taller. this one could only allow one child in it at a time , still our little one likes it.i just wish it was a little bigger.I 'm afraid our little guy will out grow it fairly fast.I would not buy it again because of the height size.
customer_reviews.author: ninja

customer_reviews.title: The house is made of sturdy material and withstands the dirt/rain/wind
customer_reviews.text: my kid loves playing in this house! it was a little hard to set up (lots of screws to put in) but definitely worth it! My kid loves that the doorbell actually rings. The house is made of sturdy material and withstands the dirt/rain/wind. It easily washes off dirt with water which i love! My kids also love opening/closing the window and door. These features make the house worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: I love how it's just a couple pieces to assemble but if you don't have an automatic screwdriver it might be a little bit harder for you to everything was simple to put together with pictures I don't get where the phone is supposed to go inside of it because it doesn't hang up but besides that I think it's a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nikolle

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: You honestly can't beat the price on this playhouse. It's a little smaller than others, but my 3.5 year old still fits well inside it with plenty of room to spare. Assembly required a few drill holes because things didn't line up very well as manufactured. Other than that, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: smaller than I realized
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my granddaughter. Not much room inside but enough for her, 20 months old. Was missing the decals of fireplace, light, clock and no phone was included. Too much trouble to return and was already assembled when I visited. Sturdy and I know she'll have it for years.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine M

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: So so cute! My daughter is almost three years old and tall for her age and she fits just fine in this. She is loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Cohoat

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an Easter gift for my 17 month old daughter. I am quite happy with the design of the house. I love that it has a floor and the working doorbell is great. My daughter loves it, it's the perfect size for her and her 9 year old brother. Shipped and arrives sooner than expected dates.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse for toddlers/babies.
customer_reviews.text: So my wife placed this in our living room and suddenly our house is the place that all the kids want to be at. Hopefully during the winter it’ll to the backyard and stay there. It was easy put together and seems that we’ll have this a few years until my kids grow out of it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cloutet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 3-4 year old.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves this and it fits her perfectly. I suggest you buy kitchen items for this dollhouse when you buy it or half of your real kitchen items will end up in this dollhouse like mine did. It is heavier than expected so it does not move around in the wind too much
customer_reviews.author: jrp1992

customer_reviews.title: Great Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little playhouse for my 2.5 and 1 year old. They love that the doorbell actually rings! I was able to put this together very easily and in no time at all. Very simple to assemble and not heavy at all. I love that the bottom has drain holes. The kids play peek a boo through the window. Great playhouse!
customer_reviews.author: StephB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 and 3 year old great grandbabies for Christmas! What a hit! They love going in and out the door...ringing the door bell, and pretending it is their house. Large pieces make it pretty easy to put together, and I like that it has a solid floor. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Love it for young child
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about that quality of the material. We bought this for my 2 year old who is now 5 and she still loves it. It has sustained a lot of abuse and could probably use some replacement stickers but is still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a floor to it
customer_reviews.text: Cutest playhouse ever! I like that it has a floor to it, a grill, and the openness of it. My son loves the doorbell and mail slot , I made pretend mail for him to put through the slot. It's roomy too, I'm 5'3 138lbs and I fit In there with my 2 year old , we had dinner in it the other day together :) step 2 makes the best products !
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ehause

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2-year old grandson. His Dad put it together in an hour or so and it has stood up so far (6 months) even through their move to a new house. My grandson loves it and his 9-year old sister has even climbed in to check it out and she is big for her age! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Horton-Newton, Author

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love having the solid floor on this so it's not muddy inside. My son loves playing in this house and using the play grill that sticks out. Doorbell works great and he loves it. I had a hard time getting the doorbell to fit all the way in but otherwise it was pretty easy and straightforward to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have played in/with this with my stepson for 3 years now and the only thing was that I had to reinforce the grill with a couple extra screws. Good for little kids like 2-8 years old I would think. My son is going to be 7 and we still use it when we play.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: For the Grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandkids for Christmas. They absolutely love it and play outside in it all the time. Directions are straight forward for assembly. Great value for the price and solid construction that will last them for years of playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen P.Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the you know what, to put together!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great after we have put it together but, putting it together was another issue. They did not have any holes drilled into it yet, tell you that you need a screwdriver. So I had to poke holes into it myself (not easy for a female who isn’t tool friendly) and then, when putting the grill together, the holes weren’t even aligned right so I had to make the holes bigger just to get the plastic push nails in it. Ugh! Such a headache but I’m glad the children love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Cheng

customer_reviews.title: My Son and Daughter PLAY Together now!
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old son and 1.5 year old daughter play quietly together in this thing! Usually while I'm cooking dinner I am refereeing with one hand and cooking with the other. Now they play in the house together. Santa gave it to our daughter so maybe our son realizes if he doesn't play nice he will have to get out. There's even enough room for me to sit in there while they "cook" and "feed" me dinner. I highly recommend this thing. Hubby put it together with "help" from both kiddos so it should be fairly easy for the average parent.
customer_reviews.author: Lopsie

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 and 3 year old boy grandkids. I thought they would use it as a playhouse; but, it is their storage shed for heir toy lawnmowers. Ha Ha. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: DadsaHam

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and great to have outdoor for kids. Got three boys and they all still love it. My 5 yr old got it for his 2 birthday and he still goes in it and play eoth his brothers.
customer_reviews.author: SukaLove8

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old grandson for XMAS. We have the playhouse inside and he loves it. It would have been great if it had a light inside which we are adding. Grandson loves to climb out the Windows as well as the front door. This is fine on 2 of the WIndows as they are very sturdy but we can't let him climb out the side that has the BBQ outside and table inside as its not very sturdy. It has not broken but has bent a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn J. Stillwell

customer_reviews.title: Great cozy place to nap!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new play house. He spends many hours playing and sometimes sleeping inside. I love the smooth edges and the bright colorful theme. The small details such as the clock and fireplace looks so realistic especially the working doorbell, many a time I have opened the front thinking there was someone there but it was just my son playing.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Rosana

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. Easy to clean. Can see children when they are inside I bought bc of reviews and price and it is my son’s favorite outdoor toy. Easy to put together. His favorite part is the doorbell. Highly recommend for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Calderone

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to put together!
customer_reviews.text: It was a nightmare to put together. It had no predrilled holes so you have to make them yourself which is really difficult. Batteries needed for doorbell are no included.
customer_reviews.author: AJL

customer_reviews.title: lots of stuff for grand kids to do
customer_reviews.text: our grand kids love this house. they even loved the box. lots of gadgets to fire the imagination and lots of places to hide cheerios
customer_reviews.author: DMann

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is for kids under 4. It is smaller than other playhouses by the same company which might explain why it was also less money. They use it to store their toys. Buy one of the taller houses if you are going to get one.
customer_reviews.author: simply_put

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This cute playhouse is just what we wanted and expected. It's a bit advanced for my 14 mo. granddaughter but we know she'll love it as she gets older. Right now she loves the phone and the doorbell! I "planted" some fake daises in styrofoam in the planter.. they look adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were met, if not surpassed! Super easy to assemble and the quality and size is fantastic for my grandkids. Super cute! for boys and girls
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a smaller cottage/playhouse type product that could be set up indoors as we do not have much of a backyard. We bought this for our daughter's first birthday and she loves it already. I would definitely recommend this product, especially for the younger ones. My daughter just turned one and she loves playing with the doorbell and putting her little toys in the tiny little sink. It was very easy to put together and just the right size for indoor play. The faucet for the sink doesn't fit as tight as I would like it to but other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.elle

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together I did it in under 1 hour with a power drill. (would drill holes in bottom so water can drain as others said) great little playhouse that will last forever!! I’m using it inside for winter play & then will transition outside for spring/summer fall next year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andie Paige

customer_reviews.title: My 18-month old grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson plays with this daily. It has withstood weather, rain and sun. A great price for a great product
customer_reviews.author: JRR

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 mon old G-baby love this.It fits two little ones comfortably.Or two little dogs :) It is small.Thank goodness i put it together outside because it would not fit thru the sliding glass door. The door bell works great.She loves eating her lunch or snacks with her puppies and stuffed animals,all inside.I used a large bungey cord to tether it down to a tree branch,because it seems with a good gust of wind it would blow over.She loves it thats all that matters.When she grows out of it the dogs will love it.I do like that it has a floor.Easy to put together.Fast dlvry.
customer_reviews.author: jilly

customer_reviews.title: This gift was the hit of the party and now one of her favorite gifts. It is large enough for several children ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my child's 4th birthday. This gift was the hit of the party and now one of her favorite gifts. It is large enough for several children to fit in it for play (even adults can fit, but not stand up). There is a working doorbell and the kids use junk mail (folded) to put in the mail slot. They have a blast and really enjoy it. We are keeping it inside so it doesn't fade from the sun. I expect many hours of fun with this great gift!
customer_reviews.author: tampacollector2

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter helped me put it together in about 20 minutes. My grandkids come over often and they love to play in the house. They really like the working door bell. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Eva McCurdy

customer_reviews.title: very cute and sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: We didn't know if our two year old grandson would really play with this, but we found that he loved it so much he would run in and out of it all day. At times he made it his house, other times it was a restaurant and he took "orders" and only charged us $5,000 for a hamburger (and since the burger came with such a cute smile-I bought 2). His 7 year old brother saw all that fun and joined in and they both were in it constantly. Definitely worth every penny. Not sure how it will hold up outdoors in the Phoenix sun, but as an inside toy it definitely got two thumbs up from me!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Joyce Fischer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cut little play house that only took about 45 min to put together! It is super simple and very cute. It isn't very heavy but a bit awekward to move just because it is a big square house....my husband can definatly move it himself though to mow. Make sure u have 2 AAA batteries for the door bell and a Phillips screwdriver when u get ready to put it together. I highly reccomend this cottage because its cute....easy to put together and you can see ur child really well while they are in it. Oh ya...and the price is very reasonable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Harper 's House
customer_reviews.text: So fun for my 3 y/o .Plays daily in it . Pretends it s a school , church , Dad's office ... The doorbell is fun . We added some command hooks for her backpack. Great value !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The floor does not drain. If you leave it ...
customer_reviews.text: The floor does not drain. If you leave it outside, rain will pool up in the floor. We solved this by drilling holes in the floor, but it's an irritating design flaw. Also, it's a little small.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 3 years old even my 7 years old play inside. They have so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Margaux

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Our three-year-old granddaughter absolutely loves this house and so does her daddy!
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble except for one part.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble except for one part, the grill and sink combo. My husband had to place the screws for this at a totally different angle than what the directions called for to get it to attach to the house, but other than that it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Playhouse for Hours of Fun!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice playhouse with doorbell. Great for 2 years and older. Great communication from the seller. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is very cute and appears to be very well ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute and appears to be very well built. The little ones are really enjoying it. But please note that it is much smaller than it appears in the advertised picture.
customer_reviews.author: S. Torok

customer_reviews.title: This has been great for my kid
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my kid, our neighbors and even family parties! Lots of fun, easy to put together and clean. We keep it outdoors mostly.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old granddaughter loves this playhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Granddaughter’s 3rd birthday she loves it and so do I. She wants to play in it everyday which gets her outside.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4Memeof2

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it (1 and 3 year olds)
customer_reviews.text: The boys love it (1 and 3 year olds). They love the door bell and mail slot, and the opening doors and shutters. Mostly we keep it inside, sometimes outside in the shade on a nice day. We even added "flowers" to the window box. Btw, assembly wasn't too bad! A winner 😀.
customer_reviews.author: Tmtsheridan

customer_reviews.title: This house is my toddlers favorite place to read her books
customer_reviews.text: This house is my toddlers favorite place to read her books, play with her dolls, BBQ her pretend corn and hotdogs. She absolutely loves playing in it. It is currently in our living room since she got it for Christmas, but once spring hits it will be in our backyard. I have found it to be sturdy and easy to care for inside. If outside becomes an issue I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter loves hers! Screams with delight every time you ring the doorbell. Talks on the phone, when not climbing all over it. Sturdy and I love that it has an attached floor. My son said it was easy to assemble. Actually he said they had fun putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Great playhouse for a one-year-old
customer_reviews.text: This house provides endless fun for my one year-old. We have it set up inside of the house. She loves to bring her toys inside and play with them in her own space. Her favorite is the doorbell. She could push that thing all day long. Doesn't really bother me as it's not too annoying. It seems a good size for her right now and can see using it for at least another two years or so. It is well-made and we are happy with our purchase. My only complaint is that the table is somewhat unsteady.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old Granddaughter loves her house!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute house...perfect for a 2 year old and her 5 year old brother fits, but a bit snug...they have fun fixing each other breakfast with their play food and pan set. They love the doorbell that rings, but after about 50 rings it can be trying, but they love it so I can live with it, but you can remove the batteries from it if you find it too annoying and it does sound like a real doorbell.....it is really a cute tidy house and the floor does keep the bugs out and the shoes clean. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Memaw 43

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with the positive. My daughter loves this and it is the perfect size for her and for our very small yard. Now the negative. It was slightly difficult to put together and two of the screws broke during construction. Not all of the holes matched up like they should have. It also arrived a week late and the box was practically smashed.
customer_reviews.author: leofgythsmama

customer_reviews.title: Not only do they love it but just about every kid that comes over ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my 1 yo and 3 yo old. Not only do they love it but just about every kid that comes over to play enjoys it. Definitely a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: Our little bub loves his house and plays in it ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little bub loves his house and plays in it every day. We have it tucked into corner of the living room and decorate it for all the holidays so far. He gets a kick out of the working doorbell and opening and closing the window shutters and door.
customer_reviews.author: Joyous Luck

customer_reviews.title: Used in a daycare
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our toddlers at a daycare center and they absolutely love playing with it. We needed something with lots of windows and openings to keep constant watch over the children. The one slight dislike is that the windows and door is at a slightly too short height that the children are constantly wanting to climb over them. So far the table has held up but I worry that with how much the children are inclined to push/lean on it, it won't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: db24

customer_reviews.title: Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: It's only been up a week, so Sturdiness and Durability will need to be proven over time. It arrived promptly and we were relieved that there were no pictures on the box. THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old still loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loves this and has for the past 18 months. We keep it inside, in his play room and he plays with it almost every day. He loves the doorbell and the seat inside. It is big enough for at least 2 kids to fit in it. The grill on the outside is not used.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae J.

customer_reviews.title: Water builds up
customer_reviews.text: When there is heavy rainfall the watter builds up and the factory holes are not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids, not the easiest to put together
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this house but it was a pain to put together. We also originally hoped to move the house in and out depending on the season but it would be hard to do that due to everything being screwed in. Otherwise, it is a great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Dan h.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it, but minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: 18 month old daughter loves it, particularly the doorbell. The doorbell was hard to assemble. Drainage could be better. Both the roof and the grill collect stagnant water and don't drain. Also, the flower box is very narrow and shallow. It barely fits 2 small standard flowers from the Home Depot garden center.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together and sturdy too. My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read instructions, my son and i put it together the night before Christmas in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: stephen woods

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Shipped Quickly & Durable Cottage
customer_reviews.text: Step 2 is a reputable company that makes kids toys. I bought this from Amazon for $135, shipping included, and it arrived in 2 days! I immediately put this together for my nephew and he was super eager to go inside to play. Awesome little play house for the price. Comes with ringing door bell and phone. Only complaint is that you really should have a power drill to install this and the sink isn't very sturdy. Overall, good deal for the price. I really wouldn't pay more than $175 for this though.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my daughter for her 1 year old birthday and she absolutely loves it! The age range they give is a lot shorter that what i believe it could be. I think they say 18 months to 3 years old? But i think 1-5 years old. Love how it looks in our yard too! The planter box comes empty, but i stuck a bouquet of fake flowers from the dollar store in there and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Perfect playhouse for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Light weight so it’s easy to move around the yard. My girls absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: chris morrison

customer_reviews.title: Good little play house
customer_reviews.text: My 1and a half twin boys like this little house a lot. We keep it in our living room. They dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Not for any older than a3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, but my 3 year old didn't use it as much as we thought he would. Maybe for younger kids. But a child and adult can fit in it.
customer_reviews.author: $am n €had

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a very large heavy box. We placed the little cottage in the living room and my kids just love it, specially my little one. During the first week, they even ate inside it. Now, it is their "official" hiding place, which I find funny because I can see them inside. The cottage totally paid for itself! I recommend this product for ages between 2 to 5; however, I should say that I fit inside it :-)
customer_reviews.author: A costumer

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Box cane in broken. Plastic broken. Difficult to assemble because plastic not made for the screws have to make your own holes in the thick plastic .
customer_reviews.author: Rostislav Tabak

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, despite the doorbell not working.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute house, we bought it for my 2yr old niece and she loves it! The working doorbell was her favorite part, but we had about a week of torrential rain and when she played with it after the bell didn't work anymore. Am going to see if I can get a replacement. She keeps pressing but no sound, she is so disappointed. Other than that she loves the house and the little seat and sink! She plays for hours even without the doorbell!
customer_reviews.author: queenjeni

customer_reviews.title: My 3 and 4 year old fit in it just fine, they kind of lost interest in it quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, husband put it together in about 20 minutes. My 3 and 4 year old fit in it just fine, they kind of lost interest in it quickly but hopefully it's just a phase. All and all though if your looking for a play house this one is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but should be better overall
customer_reviews.text: Decent overall product, though Step 2 in general uses what appears to be fairly low quality labor and materials because things don't line up well on many of their products, and things like a clock and fireplace should have been something more significant than a sticker. Otherwise, our kid likes it, and it was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and fits great inside
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this house. We have it in our living room of our townhouse and it is working. One adult and toddler can squeeze inside and play together...probably about 3 small kids. Has 2 seats and our son is just head over heals. The floor is great and the shutters are fun. I got this for $99.00 on thanksgiving here on amazon...Not sure I would have wanted to pay 179.00 but probably would have paid about 130.00 if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Sma

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my Grandaughter's 2nd Birthday. It was easy to assemble and is very Sturdy. I have it sitting in my living room and my granddaughter plays in it constantly. It was the best investment for her imaginative play. So happy I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Carson

customer_reviews.title: Cute outdoor playhouse for small children
customer_reviews.text: Toddler granddaughter loves the house. Only drawback is that the floor collects rain & house has to be dumped on its side to drain.
customer_reviews.author: Bvorgang

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My twins (19 months old currently) love this little house! My 5 year old does, too. The older kids like to play with it, but of course don't fit inside too well. This is such a cute little house and it's very well made. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 Neat and Tidy Cottage
customer_reviews.text: The Step2 Neat and Tiday Cottage is very cute. Assembly was SUPER easy and took me less than an hour...A drill would have made it a LOT faster. I would recommend a second set of hands to ensure everything is lined up straight before screwing anything think in permanently. I think this is a great little house for the age group of 1 1/2 to about 5, then I think you are going to start running into issues with space. Although this house will work great for us now (my daughter is 2 1/2), I can see her quickly outgrowing this item in terms of height.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie j smith

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 playhouse
customer_reviews.text: Drainage wasn't very good. Had to refill the holes. Otherwise great item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 18 months, and he absolutely loves his new house. It is the perfect size for him. He is having so much fun ringing the doorbell, cooking, and checking his mail. The only negative thing I can think of is there is a step where the threshold is that he has tripped over a few times. He has figured out he needs to step over it, but it is a raised part of the floor that a future buyer may want to know about. All in all, it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie - Texas

customer_reviews.title: Always check for wasps in the corner cause it is open
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my granddaughters 1st birthday It’s a good size and made well my grandchildren will get a good few years out of it. The only thing we are going to do is put small holes in the bottom cause when it rains it gets water in it
customer_reviews.author: Michele Spears

customer_reviews.title: Amazing house
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so very excited to find this little house Christmas morning!! It is easy to put together and the house stands very sturdy. It arrived on time and in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy P. Kelly-arabia

product_meta.title: step2 Playhouse Neat & Tidy Cottage
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueJoin in on the fun at your child's own home! The open design of this outdoor playhouse allows interactions at every turn through the windows and dutch-style doorway, with space for multiple kids to play or sit at the molded-in kitchen table for a pretend meal. Take turns cooking on the molded-in grill, then washing dishes in the pretend sink – don't forget to water The plants! From the working shutters to electronic doorbell and pass-through mailbox, This playhouse has so many realistic features to enhance pretend play! Made in the USA of us and imported parts.

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Step2 Neat & Tidy Cottage is perfect for year-round fun! Its molded-in floor keeps kids out of the dirt and mom's happy. The perfect playhouse for toddlers!

See more
feature_bullets: Your child’s Step2 Neat & Tidy Cottage outdoor playhouse is a great place to host a pretend dinner party!
Little ones can take care of their own home just like their adult role models do! They can answer the phone when friends call, cook meals for visitors, and even check the mail.
The working Dutch-style door allows kids to easily come and go, while the movable shutters let friends know when your little one is home and ready to play!
A great addition to any backyard, the charming design of this playhouse includes realistic stacked stone and a classic color palette.
In the box: Playhouse, play phone, decals.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,586 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Department: Toys & Games, Sports & Outdoor Play, Playhouses
